doc.title: Fate and Dreams
doc.plot: Fate and Dreams takes place in one location with just one character, spanning over one day. Ravi is a struggling writer who is also reluctantly working for the Mumbai underworld. His dream is to become a successful writer and his constantly working towards getting his script sold to a production house in Mumbai. Unfortunately nothing ever seems to work out for him. He constantly blames God for anything negative that happens to him. Ravi's lack of interest in his current job starts to upset his boss, Mirchandani. Ravi doesn't take Mirchandani's warnings seriously and ends up in a chaotic mess. Fate and Dreams tells the story of the last few hours of Ravi's life.
